dict.string: StryVr needs access to your camera for video calls and content creation.
StryVr needs access to your microphone for voice communication during video calls.
StryVr needs access to your photo library for uploading profile pictures and mentor content.
StryVr uses Face ID for secure login and authentication.
StryVr uses your location to personalize your learning experience and mentor recommendations.
StryVr needs access to Bluetooth for connecting to external devices.
StryVr needs access to your location even when the app is not in use to provide continuous personalized learning.
StryVr uses motion data to enhance your learning experience.
